label: 2% or Greater but Less than 5% Evangelical
description: this people group is greater than or equal to 2% evangelical

label: 10% or Greater Evangelical
description: this people group is greater than or equal to 10% evangelical

label: Less than 2% Evangelical, No Active CP Activity
description: this people group is less than 2% evangelical, some evangelical resources are available, but there has been no active church planting among them within the past two years

label: 5% or Greater but Less than 10% Evangelical
description: this people group is greater than or equal to 5% evangelical

label: Less than 2% Evangelical, Concentrated CP Activity
description: this people group is less than 2% evangelical but there has been initial or concentrated church planting among them within the past two years

label: Less than 2% Evangelical, Dispersed CP Activity
description: this people group is less than 2% evangelical but there has been dispersed church planting among them within the past two years
